channel.title: Help?
channel.description: I am wanting to delete every building, tree, object, ect. Without deleting every object one by one, is there any other alternative? -I know it's going to look weird, but I'm up for that challenge.

item.title: Help?
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Here’s a way to remove MiniMap Icons to get you started:

public void blahblah(int id, int absX, int absY){
	markMinimap(miniMap[id], ((absX - baseX) * 4 + 2) - myPlayer.x / 32, ((absY - baseY) * 4 + 2) - myPlayer.y / 32, false);
}


Use it as this below the DrawMap method:

blahblah(53,2518,3871);

Read full topic
